entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
